name: Ultra Mike
description:
Ultra Mike and his moustache are back in business. Put your moustache on and help Ultra Mike in his new adventure. Run around this amazing world and get as many coins as you can. Improve your gaming experience by getting some potions too! No enemy is impossible to beat, especially if you wear your moustache. Have fun throughout lots of challenging levels in this classic platform game.

Features:

- 2 worlds with challenging levels.
- Lots of enemies to defeat.
- Intuitive controls.
- Smooth graphics and sounds.
- Awesome gameplay
